questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: I don't know... it's quite hard to imagine what my life would look like in 10 years. Maybe i'm gonna be a famous comuter scientist, who is the author of somes famous piece of software, maybe a virus .... I've always been fascinated by the way botnets where working. That much power in the hands of one (or a few) man. the biggest are controlling millions of computers and are still anonymous, they're just genius.
